QuestData.Title: Taking the Fight to Nagrand
QuestData.Description: Boss-mon, good to see ya.$b$bDurotan recommended dat we be gettin' a foothold in Nagrand, so I taken the liberty of dispatchin' some of da boys.$b$bThrall's already reportin' that the outside be nearly complete. He been askin' me to let ya know they be ready for ya.$b$bA windrider be waitin' to catch ya up with the latest caravan shipment whenever you be ready, $g sir:ma'am;.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Stone Guard Brox at the caravan in Nagrand.
